articles.title: Session of SPA of DPRK to Be Convened
articles.content:
Session of SPA of DPRK to Be Convened
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK on June 7 promulgated a decision on holding a session of the SPA.
					 According to the decision, the 4th Session of the 13th SPA will be convened in Pyongyang on June 29, Juche 105 (2016).

articles.title: Joint Conference of DPRK Government, Political Parties, Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint Conference of DPRK Government, Political Parties, Organizations Held
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday to thoroughly carry out the policies for national reunification advanced by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Present there were Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, the chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party, a vice-chairman of the C.C., the Chondoist Chongu Party, officials of public organizations and representatives of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations including the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the North  Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the North Headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification.
					
					 The joint conference discussed the item "On tasks of DPRK government, political parties and organizations to thoroughly carry out the policies for national reunification advanced by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the WPK".
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said in a report that the line and policies for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un are the cream of his infinite loyalty and noble patriotic will to firmly preserve the idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification and their leadership exploits and build a prosperous, reunified country on this land without fail.
					
					 The reporter went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, having the firm determination and will to certainly achieve the independent reunification of the country by carrying out the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, laid down the independent line for national reunification as required by the prevailing situation and the times and has wisely led the struggle to achieve national reunification at a new high stage.
					
					 All the Koreans should consistently adhere to the Juche-oriented line of national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un and open up a broad avenue to reunification. 
					
					 They should hold high the banner of national independence in the struggle for achieving national reunification.
					
					 They should hold high the banner of great national unity on the road of achieving national reunification.
					
					 They should make positive efforts to ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula and achieve reunification by federal formula.
					
					 What is urgent for achieving the independent reunification of the country is to fundamentally improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is necessary to respect the agreements common to the nation and consistently implement it.
					
					  The reporter called upon all Koreans to turn out as one in the nation-wide struggle to build a dignified and prosperous reunified power, an envy of the world, on this land at any cost by thoroughly carrying out the policies for national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party, Won Tong Yon, director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., the youth league, Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the C.C, the women's union, and Kang Ji Yong, chairman of the Religious Believers Council of Korea, made speeches.
					
					 The speakers fully supported and approved the new line and policies for national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the WPK, noting that they serve as the great programmes for national reunification as they clearly indicate the path of achieving the independent reunification of Korea at an early date and the patriotic banner of reunification to be held high to achieve the great unity of the nation and prosperity.
					
					 They stressed the need to get united as one irrespective of ideology and ism, political view and religious belief and wage a dynamic struggle to realize the great unity of the nation and the independent reunification of Korea and give further momentum to the reunification movement through solidarity and alliance with political parties, organizations and personages of social standings in south Korea supporting the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 They called for making all efforts to demonstrate the dignity and wisdom of the Korean nation and successfully hold events common to the nation for promoting the nation's reconciliation and unity on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation as an immediate task.
					
					 An appeal to all Koreans was adopted at the joint conference.

articles.title: Appeal to All Compatriots Issued
articles.content:
Appeal to All Compatriots Issue
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations held on Thursday adopted an appeal to all Koreans.
					 The appeal said:
					
					 The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un clarified the Juche-oriented line and policies for national reunification with the strong determination and will not to allow the tragedy of national division to go on at the podium of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. This was a solemn declaration of the final victory in the struggle for the independent reunification expected to come before long.
					
					 Now is the crucial time for all Koreans to turn out as one and dynamically advance to pull down the barrier of hostility and confrontation and bring earlier the bright day of reunification.
					
					 At this crucial and historic juncture the DPRK government, political parties and organizations ardently appeal to all Koreans as follows, prompted by the single desire to bring earlier the new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity by thoroughly carrying out the policies for national reunification advanced at the 7th Congress of the WPK:
					
					 Firstly, let all compatriots dynamically pave the way for reunification, holding higher the banner of national independence!
					
					 National independence is the eternal lifeline of the movement for national reunification and a firm guarantee for victory.
					
					 There is no problem insolvable and no obstacle insurmountable if the Koreans join hands and pool their wisdom and efforts. 
					
					 National independence means patriotism and reunification but dependence on outsiders country-selling and division.
					
					 Secondly, let us usher in a great heyday in the cause of great national unity for the country's reunification!
					
					 The history of the struggle for national reunification is one of great national unity and the great national unity entirely means the country's reunification.
					
					 It is the real intention of the ideal of great national unity clarified by the peerless patriot that we will join hands and work for reunification and patriotism with anyone without hesitation if he or she has national conscience even though he or she had covered the road of anti-reunification in the past. 
					
					 Let's devote ourselves to the cause of achieving national reunification and great national unity irrespective of ideology and ism by directly linking one's destiny with that of the nation!
					
					 Thirdly, let all compatriots turn out and convert the land of Korea into a cradle of peace and security and paradise completely free from a war!
					
					 Let all compatriots pool efforts and come out in the nation-wide anti-U.S. sacred war for driving all the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, source of aggression and war, out of south Korea, if one wishes to lead a stable life in peace!
					
					 Genuine peace is guaranteed by arms and the most powerful self-defensive war deterrent represents justice which beats injustice.
					
					 Everybody should properly understand the benefits the DPRK's treasured nuclear sword for self-defence brings to the nation, and lay bare the confrontational and belligerent nature of those who term it "threat" and the like.
					
					 Fourthly, let's make the world see the shining appearance of a power reunified by federal formula accepted and supported by the whole nation!
					
					 The federal formula which was confirmed by the heads of the north and the south before the nation and is being accepted and supported by all compatriots is the nation's unique way of reunification as it is most reasonable, fair and aboveboard.
					
					 Let all fellow countrymen in the north, the south and abroad wholeheartedly support the reunification by federal formula, irrespective of ideology and social system, and wage a positive struggle for achieving it!
					
					 Fifthly, let us resolutely break with the past woven with hostility and antagonism, confrontation and conflict and pave a new way for improving the inter-Korean relations!
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have reached the worst phase of suffocating and that of total freeze owing to the extreme confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group are chiefly to blame for this as they reacted to the DPRK's sincere efforts and proposals for improving the inter-Korean relations at the lowest ebb by recklessly hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership and reeling off sophism about "collapse of its social system".
					
					 However, the peerlessly great man called the south Korean authorities partner for reunification with his rare and courageous decision not to ask about any past wrongdoing but hew out any rugged thorny path to find a solution to the issue of the nation, the issue of reunification, and put forward once again the reasonable way for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly understand that it is the wisest attitude for saving their destiny for them not to fail to respond to the offer made by the DPRK to advance together as partner for reunification at this juncture.
					
					 We propose opening a nation-wide grand meeting for reunification on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation, prompted by the ardent desire to bring about an epochal turn in weathering the present difficulties, improving the inter-Korean relations and accomplishing the cause of national reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans. 
					
					 We ardently call upon all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad once again to turn out as one in the sacred struggle to fling the gate of the reunified power open, their hearts burning with patriotic enthusiasm full of firm faith and optimism about the final victory in the struggle for national reunification.

articles.title: DPRK Minister of People's Armed Forces on Nuclear Deterrent for Self-Defense
articles.content:
DPRK Minister of People's Armed Forces on Nuclear Deterrent for Self-Defense 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, issued a statement on Thursday.
					 According to the statement, the 2016 Asia Security Conference was held in Singapore recently.
					
					 If the objective of the conference had been to ensure security in Asia, it should have discussed and solved necessary practical measures.
					
					 But the defense chiefs of the U.S., Japan and south Korea held a confab irrelevant to the conference at which they cried out for "thoroughly enforcing the sanctions against the north" and boosting "cooperation," claiming that the DPRK's fourth nuclear test and missile launch are a "violation" of the UNSC's "resolution" and international law.
					
					 In the end, they blustered that they would not hastily opt for dialogue before the DPRK clarifies its "will to dismantle its nukes" and discussed the issue of boosting military cooperation in the efforts to cope with the "threat from the north" including the increased "sharing of military information about the north" by kicking off a missile warning drill in July. 
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness for them to mislead public opinion by terming the DPRK's dignified nuclear force for self-defense and Strategic Force a "threat" even at the international security conference, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is the only nuclear criminal state in the world and the largest nuclear weapons state in the world.
					
					 Japan is a militarist state which is vociferating about a military giant and nuclear weaponization after throwing away even the showy "Pacifist Constitution" and "three non-nuclear principles".
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are crying out for even "nuclear weaponization to counter the north's nukes", not content with getting frantic with confrontation while conducting Hyonmu missile launching test with the firing range of 800 km they claimed capable of putting all areas of the DPRK in the striking range at the prodding of their masters U.S. and Japan.
					
					 Openly revealed at the tripartite confab was the scenario to further intensify new hostile acts against the DPRK while taking issue with its nukes and missile "threat".
					
					 It is preposterous for those wholly responsible for ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula to justify their attempt at aggression, blaming others.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we reiterate our stand that nuclear deterrent for self-defense is an all-powerful treasure sword tightly held by the DPRK to cope with the hostile forces' moves for invading it. 
					
					 Our warning is by no means an empty talk.
					
					 Any force hostile to the DPRK is bound to go to ruin
					
					 This is proved by history.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Red Cross Society Urges S. Korean Authorities to Send Back All Abductees of DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Red Cross Society Urges S. Korean Authorities to Send Back All Abductees of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society on Thursday gave an answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the fact that the south Korean puppet Intelligence Service (IS) is desperately conducting an anti-DPRK smear campaign, while resorting to its operations to allure and abduct citizens of the DPRK.
					 These days the south Korean public is strongly demanding an interview with abductees of the DPRK whom the IS illegally keeps in custody.
					
					 For example, on June 3 the Bar Association for Democratic Society and the Council of Christian Churches of south Korea requested the permission to see citizens of the DPRK abducted by the IS.
					
					 The IS gangsters are working hard to conceal their wicked nature as the mastermind of the operation for allurement and abduction and calm down the domestic and foreign public's strong criticism of them, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that they keep the abductees strictly away from any contact with outside and are making  desperate efforts to create impression at any cost that they "defected from the north according to their free will" by running the whole gamut of appeasement and deception, threat and blackmail.
					
					 The IS gangsters frantically carried out operations to lure and abduct citizens of the DPRK in foreign countries in the past, too, but they have never been so undisguised in their moves to conduct such operations in broad daylight in such a premeditated and group manner as now.
					
					 The hideous crimes committed by the south Korean puppet group in the eyes of the world clearly show how desperately they work to check the advance of the DPRK and keep afloat their bankrupt policy of confrontation.
					
					 Such spy and conspiratorial body as the IS, which stoops to any infamy to do harm to the fellow countrymen, should be disbanded as soon as possible as it brings nothing good to the national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group should apologize to the entire nation for their thrice-cursed abduction of citizens of the DPRK and immediately disorganize the IS and send back all the abductees unconditionally.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Women's Union Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Women's Union Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with a delegation of the Lao Women's Union headed by Inlavanh Keobounphanh, president of its Central Committee who is a member of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, which paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from C.C., LWU
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from C.C., LWU
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a gift from the Central Committee of the Lao Women's Union (LWU).
					 The gift was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday by Inlavanh Keobounphanh, president of the C.C. of the LWU who is a member of the C.C. of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, who is heading the LWU delegation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Lao Women's Union Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Lao Women's Union Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao Women's Union headed by Inlavanh Keobounphanh, president of its Central Committee who is a member of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, toured Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the old home of the President in reverence for him.
					
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President, they looked round the historical relics preserved at his old home.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said she was deeply impressed to visit the old home and that this is a holy place of the sun dear to all progressive people of the world as it is the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, Okryu Children's Hospital, Pyongyang Catfish Farm, etc.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, returned home Thursday after visiting the Socialist Republic of Vietnam and the Lao People's Democratic Republic.

articles.title: School Youth and Children Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
School Youth and Children Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
 Hyesan, June 9 (KCNA) -- School youth and children from across the country started a study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the study tour of the above-said revolutionary battle sites.
					 The tour group consisting of exemplary school youth and children from across the country will visit the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu associated with the exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A kick-off ceremony took place before the statues of the Generalissimos in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province on Thursday.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of the Generalissimos and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said at the meeting that the study tour would help its participants deeply grasp the revolutionary careers and feats of the Generalissimos and prepare themselves to be reliable successors to the Korean revolution who will accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution started in Mt. Paektu through generations.
					
					 They underscored the need to arm themselves with the Juche idea and Songun idea of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) by applying the anti-Japanese guerilla method of studying and grasp the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu and the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude displayed by the anti-Japanese guerillas and fully display the heroic stamina of the youth of Paektu by thoroughly applying the present campaign to create the Mallima speed to carry out the tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The study group started its march toward Mt. Paektu, flying flags of the DPRK and the youth league, led by the flags bearing the beaming images of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Working people and school youth and children in Hyesan City sent off the members of the study group.

articles.title: Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visits Ssuksom Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visits Ssuksom Revolutionary Site
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) visited the Ssuksom Revolutionary Site on Thursday on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 They went round various places of the site including the United Front Tower, being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung came to the site together with the south Korean politicians, who participated in the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea, where he indicated the orientation and ways for national reunification and bestowed favors on them.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Jo Il Min said:
					
					 Visiting the site, I came to miss President Kim Il Sung who had devoted his all to the country's reunification till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 History does not know such a great man as the President who took all compatriots to his embrace with love and benevolence while putting the nation above political view, religious belief, social stratum and class.
					
					 The President who started the cause of national reunification with his transparent spirit of independence, broad magnanimity and outstanding leadership and led it to victory will always be in the hearts of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF will hold supreme leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the lodestar of national reunification and wage a positive struggle for building a prosperous reunified power on the land of Korea at any cost.

articles.title: New Precision Shuttering Method Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Precision Shuttering Method Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A new precision shuttering method was developed by a construction company in the DPRK.
					 The new method costs only one seventh as compared with former methods in making formwork and needs no plastering, thus raising the speed and quality of construction.
					
					 It has already proved economically effective and advantageous in the construction field of the country.
					
					 Now the company renders technical services for designing, manufacturing and applying precision formwork.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Grab Tok Islets under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Grab Tok Islets under Fire 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are now making desperate efforts to grab Tok Islets, part of the territory of the Korean nation.
					 They inaugurated "Takeshima (Tok Islets) History House" in Shimane Prefecture, Japan which displays all sorts of false evidence in a bid to build up public opinion that Tok Islets "belong to Japan".
					
					 On May 29 they held an inaugural ceremony for the above-said history house in the presence of a vice-minister level politician. They jabbered that they would widely use the house for educating younger generation such as pupils of elementary and secondary schools in Japan.
					
					 Lurking behind the sinister moves of the Japanese reactionaries to grab Tok Islets and distort history in the wake of their declaration of their scenario to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" by changing the interpretation of the "Pacifist Constitution" is their cynical ploy to justify their past history of aggression and pave the way for reinvasion.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Burlesque
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Burlesque
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive Park Geun Hye who had expended all her energies for soliciting "cooperation in the campaign to force the north to dismantle nukes" during her recent junket to Africa was so seriously exhausted that she was administered intravenous drip injection and had a rest.
					 She had drip injections when she visited Canada and took part in the UN General Assembly in September, 2014 and when she visited American countries in April last year all to beg for cooperation in her moves for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. These became a laughing stock of the international community.
					
					 Touring African countries this time, too, Park cried out for "consistent reaction of the international community" while terming the nuclear development of the DPRK "a serious threat to the world peace". Her trip was clearly aimed at escalating confrontation with the DPRK as she disclosed her despicable intention to slander the fellow countrymen in utter disregard of to whom she was talking and how they are responding to her.
					
					 What she did during her junket to Africa touched off indignation and rage of all the Koreans as she stooped to any infamy to serve the purpose of garnering support for her policy for confrontation with the DPRK from outsiders and doing harm to her fellow countrymen through conspiracy with outsiders.
					
					 Sophism and vituperation of Park are just the symptom of confrontational maniac on the deathbed totally bereft of normal thinking and judging faculties. They are just hysteric fit to cover up the sacred mission and peace-loving nature of the nuclear weapons of the DPRK and to keep afloat the cooperation in the efforts to escalate confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 She hurled mud at the DPRK's line for simultaneous development of the two fronts and its measure for bolstering capabilities for self-defence and worked hard to build up international public opinion over the non-existent "threat." By doing so she sought to justify her long bankrupt policy for confrontation with the DPRK and do harm to and stifle the fellow countrymen at any cost with the help of outsiders.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence is neither a means for negotiations nor a bargaining chip for getting something.
					
					 Our nuclear weapons are a treasured sword for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world, and are also treasure common to the nation which guarantees the nation's reconciliation and reunification.
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to bolster deterrence for self-defence in every way with the nuclear weapons as a backbone to cope with the open threat of war from the aggressors and provokers, and no one is entitled to slander this.
					
					 To deny the DPRK's line on simultaneous development of the two fronts and its measure for bolstering capabilities for self-defence is a denial of the political system in the DPRK and an insult to its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 It is foolhardy for Park to dare try to do harm to the DPRK through mendicant diplomacy by frequently visiting outsiders. No matter how frequently she stages rackets for isolating and stifling the DPRK in collusion with outsiders, they will only bring her curse and denunciation from the nation and shame in the world eyes.
					
					 Park had better drop the unrealizable ambition for forcing "the north to scrap nuclear weapons" and properly face up to the world and behave herself.

articles.title: U.S. Ambition to Dominate World Is Daydream: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Ambition to Dominate World Is Daydream: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. finds it hard to conceal its uneasiness and fear of the DPRK's rapidly increasing nuclear deterrent for self-defence. 
					 The U.S. Congress is increasingly asserting the need to develop the new technology of measuring seismic tremor in a bid to detect the DPRK's nuclear test and boost the capability to identify ICBMs flying into the U.S. mainland.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a revelation of disturbed feelings of the nuclear criminal unable to have a sound sleep owing to the DPRK's access to nukes and its measures to bolster its nuclear deterrent.
					
					 When Obama took the U.S. presidential office, he did not expect the balance of force between the DPRK and the U.S. to change so much.
					
					 He calculated that the procrastination made by the U.S., persistently threatening and blackmailing the DPRK with nukes and slapping harsh economic sanctions, would help "bring down its social system" and carry out the scenario for "invading the north".
					
					 The policy of "strategic patience" reflected such ambition.
					
					 This, however, has gone totally bust.
					
					 The U.S. persistent nuclear threat to the DPRK only helped the latter join the ranks of nuclear powers. 
					
					 The U.S. ambition to dominate the world turned out to be a daydream now that the curtain has dropped on the history of U.S. unilateral nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK and the U.S. ambition to invade the DPRK proved futile.
					
					 The only way out for the U.S. to get rid of phobia and nervous prostration caused by the DPRK's tremendous military muscle is to halt all nuclear threats and blackmails and opt to make a policy switchover.

articles.title: Miserable Fate Awaits Confrontational Maniacs: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Miserable Fate Awaits Confrontational Maniacs: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling forces should not forget even a moment that the most miserable fate awaits the confrontational maniacs and traitors to the nation, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 The north and the south of Korea now stand at the crossroads of whether to pave the way for improving relations or to allow the present catastrophic situation to go on, proceeding from a strategic thinking and cool judgment over the issue of the destiny and future of the nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 We always regard as our creed the immutable truth that the nation comes above ideology and social system. Therefore, we have made strenuous efforts to join hands with the south, make a breakthrough in the barrier of confrontation and pave an avenue to improving relations.
					
					 This time, the DPRK, out of its only intention to improve the present catastrophic north-south relations through dialogue and negotiations, not military confrontation and conflict, reached its warm hands of good faith and magnanimity to the south Korean authorities, not asking about the past.
					
					 But the south Korean ruling forces are opting for confrontation, not reconciliation and unity, with inveterate repugnancy and hostility toward the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are busy with smear campaign and confrontational racket against the DPRK almost every day. This is a revelation of their dirty scheme to scupper the atmosphere for dialogue created thanks to the sincere and positive efforts made by the DPRK and rev up the climate for stifling it.
					
					 What is sought by them is the atmosphere of confrontation and war for isolating and stifling the fellow countrymen, not the one for dialogue.
					
					 Should they persist in confrontational vituperation quite contrary to the patriotic appeal made by the DPRK, they will have to pay a dear price.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Warmongers Busy with War Exercise
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Warmongers Busy with War Exercise
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean Yonhap News, the rapid task force of the south Korean puppet marine corps is getting frantic with the war exercise in the west coastal areas of Korea, timed to coincide with the puppet military warmongers' escalation of provocations against the DPRK in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and hotspot waters of the West Sea of Korea.
					 On June 5 it staged a large-scale mobile exercise from Phohang, North Kyongsang Province, to Phyongthaek port, Kyonggi Province with landing craft, transports and vehicles involved.
					
					 Blustering that there is no other option for preventing the north from bolstering its nuclear capability and putting nukes under control except for special operation such as "beheading operation", the puppet warmongers are resorting to reckless moves to increase capability for actual war through drills for a war of aggression in the wake of creation of a rapid task force to be involved in the hideous crime.

articles.title: S. Korean Personage Calls for Continuing Struggle for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
S. Korean Personage Calls for Continuing Struggle for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) --  The June 15 Single-minded Mountain Society for Reunification in south Korea held a sports meeting for implementing the joint declaration in Kuro District, Seoul on June 6, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Present there were members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and other organization.
					
					 The chairman of the mountain society said that the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration is to be marked soon.
					
					 He referred to the sports meetings for implementing the joint declaration held in every June from 2011 to refresh the June 15 spirit and strengthen unity.
					
					 He called for continuing the struggle for implementing the joint declaration despite difficult conditions.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Falsifying Truth about Forcible Drafting of Koreans
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Falsifying Truth about Forcible Drafting of Koreans
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Council with Grand Mothers of "the Volunteers Corps" in south Korea held a press conference before the girl statue for peace in the Kwangju City Office on June 1 denouncing the Japanese authorities' shameless acts, according to a south Korean newspaper.
					 Speakers said at the conference that it has been recently disclosed that Maeil Sinbo, the organ of the "government-general in Korea" during the Japanese imperialist colonial rule, released totally false reports about Korean girls who were taken to Japan for slave labor and met death.
					
					 They condemned the Japanese imperialists for taking guiltless girls to Japan and forced them to do slave labor and totally falsifying facts about their death.
					
					 They demanded the Japanese prime minister personally make an apology and reparation for embellishing the forcible drafting through false reports and trampling down the honor of many Koreans.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Hungarian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Hungarian Political Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted by the Hungarian Workers' Party on its website on June 2.
					 The work published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013) deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked in Peru, Guinea
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked in Peru, Guinea
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Peru and Guinea on June 2 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). They included an opening ceremony of Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition and a film show in Peru and a reading session in Guinea.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, books on their greatness, books and photos introducing the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and handicrafts showcasing the culture and advantages of the Korean nation.
					
					 Participants of the film show watched Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity."
					
					 A lawmaker of San Miguel District of Lima City, Peru in a speech said that the exhibition would provide an occasion for the Peruvian people to know better about the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people, and time-honored culture of the Korean nation.
					
					 The battalion commander of a commando of the Defense Ministry of Guinea said that the feats Kim Jong Il performed for party-building will shine forever along with socialist Korea winning victories.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in Hungary, Slovakia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in Hungary, Slovakia
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given by the Hungarian Workers' Party and the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association on June 2 and 3 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The speakers informed the participants of the fact that Marshal Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK at its Seventh Congress and that they sent congratulatory messages and floral baskets to him and paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the WPK has won victory only, they noted the service personnel and people of the DPRK have bravely overcome stern trials and difficulties unprecedented in history and firmly defended the socialist banner thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: SANA Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
articles.content:
SANA Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The SANA posted an article titled "On the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, DPRK adheres to its line and makes steady advance for progress and development" on its website on June 6.
					 The article said:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is guiding the Korean people to progress and development under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un while adhering to the line of the great leader President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In the first period of his start of the work at the Central Committee of the WPK leader Kim Jong Il wisely led it to hold fast to the Juche idea that the popular masses are the masters of the revolution and construction and they also promote the revolution and construction as its steadfast guiding idea.
					
					 It has been clearly proven in the course of thoroughly applying the Juche idea that the idea is a new and original revolutionary idea which reflects the interests of the people and the requirements of the era of independence.
					
					 Under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, the Korean people are dynamically advancing in accordance with their struggle line under the banner of the Juche idea founded and enriched by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Se convocara asamblea popular suprema de RPDC
articles.content:
Se convocara asamblea popular suprema de RPDC
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- Segun una resolucion fechada 7 del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tendra lugar el 29 de junio en esta capital el cuarto periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la APS de la RPDC.

articles.title: Efectuada conferencia conjunta de gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de RPDC
articles.content:
Efectuada conferencia conjunta de gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de RPDC
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la conferencia conjunta del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para materializar cabalmente la orientacion por la reunificacion de la patria presentada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Chol, vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el presidente del CC del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, el vicepresidente del CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U, los funcionarios de las entidades sociales y otros delegados de gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC inclusive el Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y las direcciones nortenas de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y de la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria.
					
					En la conferencia debatieron el tema "Sobre las tareas del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la RPDC para materializar cabalmente la orientacion por la reunificacion de la patria presentada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el VII Congreso del PTC".
					
					Yang Hyong Sop dijo en el informe que la linea y la orientacion por la reunificacion de la patria presentadas por el Mariscal devienen la expresion de su noble fidelidad y voluntad patriotica de mantener firmemente y glorificar para siempre la idea de reunificacion de la patria y las hazanas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y levantar a toda costa sobre este territorio patrio una potencia prospera reunificada.
					
					Y senalo que con la firme decision y voluntad de lograr sin falta la reunificacion independiente de la patria mediante la materializacion cabal de los legados de grandes Lideres, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un presento la independiente linea por la reunificacion de la patria conforme a la demanda de la situacion y la epoca y dirige sabiamente en etapa nueva y elevada la lucha por esta causa nacional.
					
					Todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana deben abrir el ancho camino de la reunificacion de la patria manteniendo invariablemente la autoctona linea del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Hace falta enarbolar la bandera de la independencia nacional y la de gran unidad nacional en la lucha por lograr la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Hay que esforzarse por asegurar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y reunificar la patria mediante el sistema federal. 
					
					Lo mas apremiante para lograr esta empresa nacional es mejorar radicalmente las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Se debe respetar y ejecutar invariablemente los acuerdos aprobados entre ambas partes.
					
					El orador llamo a todos a levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha pannacional por edificar sobre el territorio patrio la potencia reunificada prestigiosa y prospera admirada por todo el mundo mediante la materializacion cabal de la orientacion sobre la reunificacion de la patria, presentada por el Mariscal.
					
					Acto seguido, intervinieron el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Kim Yong Dae, el director del Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, Won Tong Yon, el primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, el presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, Ju Yong Gil, la presidenta del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea, Kim Jong Sun, y el presidente del Consejo de Religiosos de Corea, Kang Ji Yong. 
					
					Los oradores apoyaron totalmente la nueva linea y orientacion sobre la reunificacion apreciandolas como programas de reunificacion que iluminan el atajo para cumplir cuanto antes la causa de reunificacion independiente de Corea y lograr la gran unidad y la prosperidad de la nacion. 
					
					Insistieron en la necesidad de dinamizar la lucha por la gran unidad nacional y la reunificacion independiente de la patria, por encima de las diferencias de las ideologias, ideales, criterios politicos y creencias, y fortalecer mas el movimiento por la reunificacion mediante la solidaridad con los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea que apoyan las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria. 
					
					Expresaron las decisiones de hacer todo lo posible por la realizacion de los actos conjuntos nacionales por el 71o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria para exaltar la dignidad y la inteligencia de la nacion coreana y promover activamente la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion.
					
					En la ocasion fue aprobado el llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Conferencia conjunta de gobierno, partidos y entidades de RPDC llama a abrir ancho camino de reunificacion
articles.content:
Conferencia conjunta de gobierno, partidos y entidades de RPDC llama a abrir ancho camino de reunificacion 
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- La conferencia conjunta del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que tuvo lugar el dia 9, adopto un llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana:
					En el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un aclaro la autoctona linea y orientacion por la reunificacion de la patria partiendo de la firme decision y voluntad de no tolerar mas la tragedia de la division nacional, lo cual es la solemne declaracion sobre la victoria final de la reunificacion independiente que llegara en un futuro cercano, senala el documento y prosigue: 
					
					Ahora, todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana deben levantarse como un solo hombre por eliminar la barrera de hostilidad y confrontacion y adelantar el jubilo de reunificacion. 
					
					A partir del unanime deseo de abrir con antelacion la nueva era de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad mediante la materializacion cabal de la orientacion por la reunificacion de la patria, presentada en el VII Congreso del PTC en este periodo historico e importante, el gobierno, los partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC llaman fervientemente a toda la nacion coreana como lo siguiente: 
					
					1. !Todos los coreanos abramos con dinamismo el avance de la reunificacion enarbolando mas la bandera de la independencia nacional! 
					
					La independencia nacional es la eterna linea de vida y firme garantia de la victoria del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Si los coreanos se toman las manos y unen sus inteligencias y fuerzas, no tendran ningun problema insoluble ni una barrera inconquistable. 
					
					La independencia nacional es el patriotismo y reunificacion. Y la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras es la traicion a la patria y la division nacional. 
					
					2. !Abramos la era dorada de la causa de gran unidad nacional por la reunificacion de la patria!
					
					La historia de la lucha por la reunificacion de la patria es la de gran unidad nacional que significa la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Tomar la mano y hacer esfuerzos conjuntos por la reunificacion con todos los que tienen la minima conciencia nacional, aunque en el tiempo pasado se opusieron a la reunificacion, esto es el noble ideal de gran unidad nacional presentado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, patriota sin igual. 
					
					!Hagamos esfuerzos abnegados por la causa de reunificacion y de gran unidad nacional vinculando sus propios destinos con el de la nacion y por encima de las diferencias de las ideologias, ideales y doctrinas!
					
					3. !Transformemos el territorio patrio como paraiso y nido de la paz y seguridad libre de la guerra!
					
					!Todos los coreanos, que desean una vida pacifica y estable, levantemonos en la sagrada guerra antiyanqui pannacional por expulsar completamente con las fuerzas unidas a las tropas agresoras imperialistas norteamericanas de la Peninsula Coreana, foco de la agresion y la guerra!
					
					  La paz verdadera se garantiza por el fusil y la justicia que vence la injusticia reside en el mas poderoso disuasivo de guerra de autodefensa.
					
					  Todos deben conocer correctamente los beneficios que nuestras armas nucleares autodefensivas ofrecen a la nacion y revelar agudamente la naturaleza conflictiva y belicista de los que lo califican de "amenaza".
					
					  4. !Demostremos a todo el mundo el aspecto majestuoso de la potencia reunificada a modo del sistema federal apoyado y aprobado por toda la nacion!
					
					  El sistema federal confirmado por los maximos dirigentes del Norte y el Sur ante la nacion y apoyado y aprobado por todos los coreanos, es el mas racional, imparcial y unico modo de reunificacion de nuestra nacion.
					
					  !Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar apoyemos absolutamente la reunificacion a modo del sistema federal por encima de las diferencias de las ideas y regimenes  y luchemos con dinamismo por lograrlo!
					
					  5. !Abramos nueva salida para la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur despidiendo decididamente del pasado manchado por la hostilidad, el antagonismo, la confrontacion y el choque!
					
					  Ahora las relaciones intercoreanas se hallan en el peor estado de sofocacion y agonia debido a la confrontacion que llega al extremo.
					
					  La responsabilidad de dicha situacion recae enteramente sobre la banda conservadora surcoreana que respondio con el imprudente insulto a la maxima dignidad y la sofisteria del "derrumbe del regimen" a todos los esfuerzos sinceros y las propuestas de buena fe que hicimos por cambiar a favor las relaciones N-S que se empeoran.
					
					  Pero nuestro gran hombre sin par llamo a las autoridades surcoreanas como acompanante de la reunificacion y volvio a presentar el remedio racional para la mejora de las relaciones N-S con la extraordinaria decision y gran audacia de tolerar cualquier pasado y abrir el paso aunque sea dificil para resolver el problema nacional y el de reunificacion.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deben conocer exactamente que tomar nuestra mano tendida para avanzar juntos como acompanantes de la reunificacion deviene el mas sabio medio para salvar su destino.
					
					  Proponemos abrir la gran reunion de reunificacion pannacional con motivo del 71o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria a partir del ardiente deseo de superar las dificultades actuales y registrar un cambio trascendental en las relaciones N-S y el cumplimiento de la causa de la reunificacion de la patria con el proposito y las fuerzas unidas de todos los coreanos.
					
					  Volvemos a exhortar calurosamente a todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar a levantarse unanimemente en la sagrada lucha por abrir de par en par las puertas de potencia reunificada con la firme confianza y el optimismo en la victoria final de la causa nacional y con el entusiasmo patriotico.

articles.title: Disuasivo nuclear de RPDC no puede ser pretexto de agresion y guerra, declara ministro de FAP
articles.content:
Disuasivo nuclear de RPDC no puede ser pretexto de agresion y guerra, declara ministro de FAP
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- El general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hizo publica el dia 9 una declaracion. 
					Hace pocos dias, tuvo lugar en Singapur la "reunion de seguridad de Asia de 2016", anuncia la nota y continua:
					
					Si fuera un foro para asegurar la seguridad de Asia, se debian discutido y tomado en el las medidas realistas por el respecto. 
					
					Pero, los ministros de Defensa de EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea efectuaron aparte un complot, ocasion en la cual insistieron en la necesidad de "practicar estrictamente la sancion anti-Norte" y "estrechar la cooperacion" diciendo que la cuarta prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de misil de la RPDC devienen la "violacion" a la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y a la ley internacional.
					
					A la larga, disparatearon que no iniciaran el dialogo con imprudencia antes de que la RPDC aclare la "voluntad de renunciar las armas nucleares" y que fortaleceran la cooperacion militar frente a la "amenaza del Norte" incluso el aumento de "compartimiento de las informaciones militares anti-Norte" desde el inicio de los ejercicios de alerta de misil que se desarrollaran en el mes proximo.
					
					Deviene el climax del cinismo el que hasta en la reunion de seguridad internacional inducen en error la opinion publica calificando de "amenaza" las prestigiosas fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa y las fuerzas estrategicas de la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. es el unico pais criminal nuclear y mayor poseedor de armas nucleares en el mundo. 
					
					Japon es el Estado militarista que persigue la conversion de su pais en la potencia militar y el armamento nuclear abandonando hasta la "constitucion pacifista" y los "tres principios de desnuclearizacion". 
					
					Bajo el amparo de los amos norteamericano y japones, los titeres surcoreanos se entregaron al enfrentamiento fratricida realizando hasta el lanzamiento de misil Hyonmu de 800 km de alcance que puede atacar toda la extension norcoreana. E insatisfechos con esto, abogan ahora por el "armamento nuclear frente a las armas nucleares del Norte". 
					
					La presente cita tripartita anuncio sin escrupulos la artimana de intensificar nuevas acciones hostiles anti-RPDC bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza" nuclear y de misil de este pais socialista.
					
					Es muy ridiculo que los responsables de la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana justifiquen el intento de agresion imputando la culpabilidad a otro. 
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, reafirmamos que nuestro disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa es el remedio todopoderoso para hacer frente a las maniobras de agresion anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles. 
					
					Nuestra advertencia no es una palabra vacia. 
					
					La historia ensena que las fuerzas hostiles anti-RPDC, sin excepcion alguna, no podran evitar el arruinamiento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Union de Mujeres de Laos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Union de Mujeres de Laos

articles.title: Regresa a Pyongyang delegacion de PTC tras realizar visita a Vietnam y Laos
articles.content:
Regresa a Pyongyang delegacion de PTC tras realizar visita a Vietnam y Laos
